title: Why are quality tanks in some new vehicles but not in others? - Quora

response.answer_text: Are we talking about fuel tanks? Fuel tanks must meet federal safety standards in most countries. Not sure what you mean by “quality” tanks or what standards you are using to define or determine “quality.” There is not enough information provided to even guess ‘why’ such tanks are present in vehicles or not.
What tanks in what vehicles? Quality refers to whether something meets specifications so you haven’t given any specific information.
